# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(spp LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(spp "")
set_target_properties(spp PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "spp")
set_target_properties(spp PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")

    GLEW_NO_GLU
    GLEW_STATIC
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
target_compile_options(spp PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/openmp>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/openmp>
)
set_target_properties(spp PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(spp PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(spp PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(spp PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(spp PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(spp PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET spp PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
